sentences.en: As the terrain became progressively more hilly the engine note began to sound faintly ragged.
sentences.cn: 道路越来越起伏,发动机开始发出微弱刺耳的响声.

sentences.en: Hiding beneath this hilly area are the haunting Waitomo Glowworm Caves.
sentences.cn: 在这山地之中藏着让我无法忘怀的怀托摩萤火虫儿岩洞.

sentences.en: Hilly countries can be canalized by the construction of locks, tunnels, and bridge aqueducts.
sentences.cn: 可以通过修筑闸门 、 隧道及高架引水道在丘陵地区开通运河.

sentences.en: In 1978, the farm's hilly orchards increased by 300 mu.
sentences.cn: 1978年, 这个农场新增山地果园300亩.

sentences.en: In the western of China are intricate terrains and many hilly regions.
sentences.cn: 我国西部地区地势复杂,多丘陵.

sentences.en: Is located in loess hilly region, serious soil erosion.
sentences.cn: 地处黄土丘陵区, 水土流失严重.

sentences.en: Many of the mountain, plateau, hilly and basin areas are unsuited for living.
sentences.cn: 中国的不少山地 、 高原 、 丘陵和盆地是不适宜人居住的.

sentences.en: Parts of West Virginia are very hilly.
sentences.cn: 西弗吉尼亚的部分地区丘陵起伏.

sentences.en: Territory surrounded by mountains, between hilly, craggy, are mountain basin.
sentences.cn: 境内四面环山, 中间丘陵起伏, 沟壑纵横, 是山间盆地.

sentences.en: The areas where the fighting is taking place are hilly and densely wooded.
sentences.cn: 战斗发生的地区丘陵起伏，树木茂密。

sentences.en: The hilly country has a highway.
sentences.cn: 那片丘陵地区有一条公路.

sentences.en: The island of Leros is divided by two narrow necks of land into three hilly sectors.
sentences.cn: 勒罗斯岛被两个狭窄的地峡分为三个崎岖不平的山区.

sentences.en: The northern Atlantic coastal plain was narrow, and much of the land was hilly and stony.
sentences.cn: 北部大西洋沿岸平原狭窄, 相当大一部分土地是山地、石头地.

sentences.en: This flower grows on a hilly area.
Throughout the area and can be divided into the hilly area.
sentences.cn: 全境可分为山地区和丘陵区.

sentences.en: Villas on the hilly terrain near Rome were designed with terraced gardens.
sentences.cn: 罗马附近山丘地带的别墅被设计成了台地园.

words.tran_cn: 丘陵的；陡的；多小山的；多坡的
